column4: HELP: Using Ubuntu 12.04. DNS Resolutions are broken in both computers I have running 12.04, suddendly DNS stops resolving, while the other (Windows) computers on the network run ok. Any idea what is going on?
/etc/resolvconf/resolv.conf.d/head writes to /etc/resolv.conf , so you should have your nameserversw listed in " head "
and ignore the warning in the head file
